creator: mceuen@hp.com
text: When creating a new XWPFDocument from scratch, there is no way to create an OpenXml footnotes document part. I am submitting a patch that adds an XWPFFootnotes class and also makes the existing XWPFFootnote object implement the IBody interface so that it can receive paragraph and table elements. The same thing may need to be done for endnotes in the future.

Created attachment 27272
Binary tar.gz of the added files.

Adding two files: XWPFFootnotes.java and TestXWPFFootnotes.java.
creator: mceuen@hp.com
mceuen@hp.com
